page.title: 01TYNEMOUTH GAZETTEER
page.content: {Population}(with North Shields:67 090 {Schools}: Priory Primary (4-11) Sir James Knott Nursery(2-5) (North Tyneside LEA) The King's School (7-18) (Independent) {Churches}:Church of the Holy Saviour (Anglican) Our Lady and St.Oswin (Roman Catholic) {Hotels} : Grand, Park {Metro } : Services to Newcastle and South Shields {Buses } : Services to North Shields, Whitley Bay, Newcastle. {Early Closing }: Wednesday {Golf} : Tynemouth Golf Club {Bowls } : Northumberland Park, Tynemouth Park {Sailing }: Prior's Haven
